description.text: You can deliver one of your blessings with greater speed.

sections.Benefit: Choose one of your blessings that normally requires a standard action to use. You can expend two of your daily uses of blessings to deliver that blessing (regardless of whether it's a minor or major effect) as a swift action instead.
sections.Special: You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you choose a different blessing.
